caption.p:
(a) Annealing effect on the Ni K-edge EXAFS spectra of Ni
x B catalysts: results from an as-prepared sample are compared with those for samples annealed in Ar at 300 °C (Ni
x B-300) and 1000 °C (Ni
x B-1000). Operando Ni K-edge (b) EXAFS and (c) XANES spectra for the Ni
x B-300 catalyst collected under OER conditions after conditioning (10 CVs) and at different applied potentials. Adapted with permission from ref ( 554). Copyright 2017 WILEY-VCH Verlag GmbH and Co. KGaA, Weinheim.
